import java.util.Scanner;
public class Main {
	public static void main(String args[]){
		Scanner sc =new Scanner(System.in);
		int n=sc.nextInt();
		int m=sc.nextInt();
		int h=sc.nextInt();
		int array[]=new int[m];
		int sum=0;
		for(int i=0;i<m;i++){
			array[i]=sc.nextInt();
			sum+=array[i];
		}	
		if(sum<n)
			System.out.println("-1");
		else{
			int left =sum-array[h-1];
			double prob=1-(binom(left,n))/(binom(sum,n));
			System.out.printf("%.6f",prob);
		}	
		sc.close();
	}
	private static long binom(int n, int k){
        if(n<k)
        	return 0;
        if (k>n-k)
            k=n-k;
 
        long b=1;
        for (int i=1, m=n; i<=k; i++, m--)
            b=b*m/i;
        return b;
    }
}
